trans-unit.source: Allows you to determine whether a method is a state machine method.
trans-unit.target: 可讓您判斷方法是否為狀態機器方法。

trans-unit.source: You should not apply the `StateMachine` attribute to methods in your code.
trans-unit.target: 您不應該套用`StateMachine`屬性至您的程式碼中的方法。

trans-unit.source: For methods that are state machine methods, the compiler will apply the <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.AsyncStateMachineAttribute> or <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.IteratorStateMachineAttribute> in the emitted IL.
trans-unit.target: 狀態機器方法的方法，編譯器會套用<xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.AsyncStateMachineAttribute>或<xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.IteratorStateMachineAttribute>中發出的 IL。

trans-unit.source: When checking whether a method is a state machine method, it is preferable to instead check for following attributes, which are derived from `StateMachineAttribute`:
trans-unit.target: 當檢查的方法是否為狀態機器方法，最好改為檢查是否有下列屬性，衍生自`StateMachineAttribute`:

trans-unit.source: `StateMachineAttribute` cannot be used to check whether a method is a state machine method if the method is an iterator method in C#.
trans-unit.target: `StateMachineAttribute` 不能用於檢查方法是否為狀態機器方法是否方法是在 C# 中的迭代器方法。

trans-unit.source: The type object for the underlying state machine type that was generated by the compiler to implement the state machine method.
trans-unit.target: 基礎狀態機器型別的型別物件，編譯器產生此型別以實作狀態機器方法。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.StateMachineAttribute" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.StateMachineAttribute" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Returns the type object for the underlying state machine type that was generated by the compiler to implement the state machine method.
trans-unit.target: 傳回基礎狀態機器型別的型別物件，編譯器產生此型別以實作狀態機器方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets the type object for the underlying state machine type that was generated by the compiler to implement the state machine method.
trans-unit.target: 取得基礎狀態機器型別的型別物件，編譯器產生此型別以實作狀態機器方法。

trans-unit.source: This property may be useful for debuggers and reflection tools.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性可能是適用於偵錯工具 」 和 「 反映工具。
